alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 22 at 2:57PM EST until January 23 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 2 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (10.5 to 12.4 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA and Eastern Plymouth MA Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 2 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/11 AM 10.7/11.2 1.2/ 1.7 -0.7/-0.2 2 None 23/12 AM 9.2/ 9.7 -0.3/ 0.2 -0.6/-0.1 2 None 23/12 PM 11.2/11.7 1.7/ 2.2 -0.2/ 0.3 5 Minor 24/01 AM 9.0/ 9.5 -0.6/-0.1 -1.0/-0.5 5-6 None 24/01 PM 9.9/10.4 0.4/ 0.9 -1.3/-0.8 3-4 None 25/02 AM 9.5/10.0 0.0/ 0.5 -0.6/-0.1 2-3 None Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
